    • Method Detail

      • createStatementViewForOpenItems

        public static AgencyBillStatementView createStatementViewForOpenItems(Producer producer)
        Construct a view with all the billed and due items that are not fully paid. Supports the Open Items screen.
        Parameters:
        producer - a Producer
        Returns:
        an AgencyBillStatementView instance loaded up with all billed and due items that are not fully paid

      • getDisplayOptionLabel

        public java.lang.String getDisplayOptionLabel()
        Returns:
        a display string that contains information about a single statement invoice. This is used in the dropdown select list of statement invoices that appears in the UI to allow the user to select a statement invoice for example when launching the agency payment wizard.

      • getAgencyBillPlanName

        public java.lang.String getAgencyBillPlanName()
        Returns:
        the name of the agency bill plan associated with the producer associated with this view

      • getPolicyPeriodFilter

        public java.lang.String getPolicyPeriodFilter()
        Returns:
        String that is used for the "policy starts with" filter. If it is non null, then the view will display results that are filtered such that only invoice items from policies whose policy number starts with this string will be displayed.

      • setPolicyPeriodFilter

        public void setPolicyPeriodFilter(java.lang.String policyPeriodFilter)
        Parameters:
        policyPeriodFilter - string that is used for the "policy starts with" filter. If it is non null, then the view will display results that are filtered such that only invoice items from policies whose policy number starts with this string will be displayed.

      • getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItems

        public java.util.List<? extends ChargeOwnerWithInvoiceItemsView> getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItems()
        Returns:
        The UNFILTERED list of all PolicyPeriodItemsView objects that should be displayed by this view. Each PolicyPeriodItemsView in the list represents one policy period and those invoice items of the policy period which should be displayed by this view.

      • getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFiltered

        public java.util.List<? extends ChargeOwnerWithInvoiceItemsView> getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFiltered()
        Returns:
        The FILTERED list (using the "policy starts with" filter or other filter) of all PolicyPeriodItemsView objects that should be displayed by this view. Each PolicyPeriodItemsView represents one policy period and those invoice items of the policy period which should be displayed by this view.

      • getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsAsArray

        public ChargeOwnerWithInvoiceItemsView[] getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsAsArray()
        Returns:
        An UNFILTERED array containing all PolicyPeriodItemsView objects that should be displayed by this view. Each PolicyPeriodItemsView in the array represents one policy period and those invoice items of the policy period which should be displayed by this view.

      • getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFilteredAsArray

        public ChargeOwnerWithInvoiceItemsView[] getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFilteredAsArray(InvoiceItemViewOption viewOption)
        Parameters:
        viewOption - Option the user chose to control which invoice item amounts are shown. Used to limit preloading to only the necessary cases.
        Returns:
        A FILTERED array (using the "policy starts with" filter or other filter) containing all PolicyPeriodItemsView objects that should be displayed by this view. Each PolicyPeriodItemsView represents one policy period and those invoice items of the policy period which should be displayed by this view.

      • getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFilteredAsArray

        public ChargeOwnerWithInvoiceItemsView[] getPolicyPeriodInvoiceItemsFilteredAsArray()
        Returns:
        A FILTERED array (using the "policy starts with" filter or other filter) containing all PolicyPeriodItemsView objects that should be displayed by this view. Each PolicyPeriodItemsView represents one policy period and those invoice items of the policy period which should be displayed by this view.

      • formatStatus

        public java.lang.String formatStatus(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
        Specified by:
        formatStatus in interface InvoiceItemViewFormatter
        Parameters:
        invoiceItem - an invoice item
        Returns:
        a String representing the status of the invoice item (eg: New, Previously Billed, or Past Due)

      • formatStatus

        public java.lang.String formatStatus(SnapshotInvoiceItem snapshotInvoiceItem)
        Returns a string representing the status of a snapshot invoice item.
        • If the snapshot invoice item appears on the statement that own's the original version of its invoice item then it's New
        • If the snapshot invoice item appears on a later statement, then it's either Previously Billed or Past Due depending on the status of its original parent invoice.
        Specified by:
        formatStatus in interface InvoiceItemViewFormatter
        Parameters:
        snapshotInvoiceItem - the snapshotted Invoice Item from a billed statement invoice
        Returns:
        a String representing the status of the passed in snapshot item (ie: New, Previously Billed, or Past Due)

      • formatStatus

        public java.lang.String formatStatus(InvoiceItem invoiceItem,
                            InvoiceStatus status)
        Returns a string representing the status of an invoice item. The status is passed as a separate parameter because it may come either from a corresponding snapshot invoice item or from the item's invoice
        Specified by:
        formatStatus in interface InvoiceItemViewFormatter
        Parameters:
        invoiceItem - the invoice item
        status - if the invoice item was from a snapshot, then the snapshot status. Otherwise the invoice status
        Returns:
        a String representing the status of the passed in item (ie: New, Previously Billed, or Past Due)

      • getInvoiceItemsFilterType

        public AgencyPmntItemsFilterType getInvoiceItemsFilterType()
        Returns:
        typekey indicating the invoice items filter type to be used when displaying invoice items

      • setInvoiceItemsFilterType

        public void setInvoiceItemsFilterType(AgencyPmntItemsFilterType invoiceItemsFilterType)
        This method is called when the user chooses a filtering option in the UI from the dropdown list that appears in the PCF
        Parameters:
        invoiceItemsFilterType - typekey indicating the invoice items filter type to be used when displaying invoice items

      • getInvoiceItemsFilterPredicate

        protected com.google.common.base.Predicate<AgencyBillInvoiceItemView> getInvoiceItemsFilterPredicate()
        Returns:
        an appropriate Predicate for filtering invoice items

      • getTotalGrossAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalGrossAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual gross amounts of all invoice items appearing in the UI for this view. So the sum includes:
        1. All the invoice items that are actually owned by the statement invoice associated with this view AND
        2. All invoice items associated with this statement by virtue of a snapshot invoice item contained in the snapshots array of the statement invoice

      • getCurrency

        protected Currency getCurrency()

      • getTotalGrossAmountForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalGrossAmountForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual gross amounts of all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalGrossAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalGrossAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual gross amounts only of the snapshotted invoice items which are displayed by this view. These snapshotted items represent invoice items which are actually owned by a previous statement invoice (rather than the statement invoice displayed by this view) but which show up in the UI because they have not yet been paid

      • getItemsFromPreviousStatement

        public java.util.List<InvoiceItem> getItemsFromPreviousStatement()
        Returns:
        all invoice items displayed by this view which are NOT actually OWNED by the statement invoice this view displays. These items are instead owned by previous statement invoices, and are only associated with this view's statement invoice by virtue of snapshot invoice items

      • getTotalGrossAmountDueForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalGrossAmountDueForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual gross due amounts of all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalCommissionAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual commission amounts of all invoice items appearing in the UI for this view. So the sum includes:
        1. All the invoice items that are actually owned by the statement invoice associated with this view AND
        2. All invoice items associated with this statement by virtue of a snapshot invoice item contained in the snapshots array of the statement invoice

      • getTotalCommissionAmountForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionAmountForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual commission amounts of all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalCommissionAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual commission amounts only of the snapshotted invoice items which are displayed by this view. These snapshotted items represent invoice items which are actually owned by a previous statement invoice (rather than the statement invoice displayed by this view) but which show up in the UI because they have not yet been paid

      • getTotalNetAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts (gross minus commission) of all invoice items appearing in the UI for this view. This sum includes:
        1. All the invoice items that are actually owned by the statement invoice associated with this view AND
        2. All invoice items associated with this statement by virtue of a snapshot invoice item contained in the snapshots array of the statement invoice

      • getTotalNetAmountForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts (gross minus commission) of all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalNetAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts (gross minus commission) only of the snapshotted invoice items which are displayed by this view. These snapshotted items represent invoice items which are actually owned by a previous statement invoice (rather than the statement invoice displayed by this view) but which show up in the UI because they have not yet been paid

      • getTotalNetAmountSettledInclPrevSnapshotItems

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountSettledInclPrevSnapshotItems()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts paid and written off on all invoice items appearing in the UI for this view. This sum includes:
        1. All the invoice items that are actually owned by the statement invoice associated with this view AND
        2. All invoice items associated with this statement by virtue of a snapshot invoice item contained in the snapshots array of the statement invoice

      • getTotalNetAmountSettledForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountSettledForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts paid and written off on all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalNetAmountSettledForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountSettledForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts paid and written off only on the snapshotted invoice items which are displayed by this view. These snapshotted items represent invoice items which are actually owned by a previous statement invoice (rather than the statement invoice displayed by this view) but which show up in the UI because they have not yet been paid

      • getTotalNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPreviousSnapshotItems()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts unpaid on all invoice items appearing in the UI for this view. This sum includes:
        1. All the invoice items that are actually owned by the statement invoice associated with this view AND
        2. All invoice items associated with this statement by virtue of a snapshot invoice item contained in the snapshots array of the statement invoice

      • getTotalNetAmountUnsettledForItemsOnThisStatement

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountUnsettledForItemsOnThisStatement()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts unpaid on all invoice items actually OWNED by the statement invoice being displayed by this view. Note that the sum is only done over OWNED invoice items of the statement invoice displayed by this view (NOT over SNAPSHOT invoice items, which are actually owned by other statement invoices).

      • getTotalNetAmountUnsettledForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly

        public MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountUnsettledForPreviousSnapshotItemsOnly()
        Returns:
        the sum of the individual net amounts unpaid only on the snapshotted invoice items which are displayed by this view. These snapshotted items represent invoice items which are actually owned by a previous statement invoice (rather than the statement invoice displayed by this view) but which show up in the UI because they have not yet been paid
